markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 3: Tap Commodities](/Rules.aspx?ID=1803)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 539</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If your kingdom has any stockpiles of Commodities, you can attempt the [Trade Commodities](/Actions.aspx?ID=1396) activity to bolster your RP for the turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Step 3: Tap Commodities

text: Step 3: Tap Commodities Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 539 If your kingdom has any stockpiles of Commodities, you can attempt the Trade Commodities activity to bolster your RP for the turn.
